'Cinemax' (sometimes abbreviated as simply "'Max'") is an American premium cable
and satellite television network that is operated by the Time Warner subsidiary
Home Box Office Inc. The channel's name is a portmanteau of "cinema" and
"maximum". Cinemax primarily broadcasts theatrically released feature films as
well as original action series, softcore pornographic series and films,
documentaries and special behind-the-scenes features. , Cinemax's programming
reaches 16.7 million pay television subscribers in the United States. [http://www.deadline.com/2011/08/solid-start-for-strike-back-on-
cinemax-lifetimes-against-the-wall-inches-up/ Solid Start For 'Strike Back' On
Cinemax, Lifetime's 'Against The Wall' Inches Up]
categories: Television channels and stations established in 1980
